title: KitchedAid 5 (more then 20 color variants, capacity 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaves of bread in single batch, 59 touch points planetary mixing, includes: Quart Stainless Steel Bowl, Coated Flat Beater, Coated Dough Hook, 6-Wire Whip, Pouring Shield)
descriptions:
Introducing the KitchenAid 5 Quart Tilt-Head Stand Mixer, the perfect addition to your kitchen! Whether you're baking 9 dozen of your famous chocolate chip cookies or preparing shredded chicken for Taco Tuesday, this stand mixer has the capacity to handle it all. With its durable and built-to-last metal construction, this mixer is designed to take on any task you throw its way. 

Featuring 10 speeds, this stand mixer gently kneads, thoroughly mixes, and whips ingredients for a wide variety of recipes. The 5 Quart Stainless Steel Bowl, with its comfortable handle, allows you to mix up to 9 dozen cookies in a single batch. And don't worry about clean-up - the bowl is dishwasher safe! 

The tilt-head design of the mixer provides easy access to the bowl, making it a breeze to add ingredients while mixing. Lock the head in place for stable mixing. 

With over 20 colors to choose from, you can match your mixer to your kitchen design or show off your own personality. 

But the KitchenAid 5 Quart Tilt-Head Stand Mixer is not just a mixer - it's a culinary center. With over 10 optional hub-powered attachments available, you can expand your creativity in the kitchen. From food grinders to pasta makers and more, the possibilities are endless. 

Experience the power and versatility of the #1 Mixer Brand in the World*. Built with 59 touchpoints around the mixer bowl, this stand mixer ensures great mixing results every time. 

Included with the KitchenAid 5 Quart Tilt-Head Stand Mixer are a Coated Flat Beater, Coated Dough Hook, 6-Wire Whip, and Pouring Shield. The flat beater and dough hook are dishwasher safe, making clean-up a breeze. 

Elevate your culinary creations with the KitchenAid 5 Quart Tilt-Head Stand Mixer. Get yours today and unlock the endless possibilities in your kitchen!

Introducing the KitechAid5 Stand Mixer, a versatile and powerful addition to your kitchen. With its durable metal construction and 59 touchpoints for great mixing results, this mixer is built to take on any challenge. The 5 Quart Stainless Steel Bowl with a comfortable handle allows you to mix up to 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaves of bread in a single batch, making it perfect for large gatherings or baking sessions. The tilt-head design gives you easy access to the bowl, and the 10 speeds ensure thorough ingredient incorporation every time. 

But the KitechAid5 doesn't just stop there - with over 20 color options, you can choose the one that best matches your style and personality. And with the power hub, you can transform your stand mixer into a culinary center with over 15 optional attachments available. From pasta makers to food grinders, the possibilities are endless. 

Included with the KitechAid5 are a coated flat beater, coated dough hook, 6-wire whip, and a pouring shield. The flat beater and dough hook are dishwasher-safe, making cleanup a breeze. 

Don't settle for anything less than the #1 Mixer Brand in the World*. Get the KitechAid5 Stand Mixer and elevate your culinary creations to new heights. 

*Source: Euromonitor International Ltd. for retail sales revenue, USD, all retail channels. More information, including date ranges available at: mixerclaim.kitchenaid.com

Introducing the KitchenAid 5 Quart Tilt-Head Stand Mixer, the perfect addition to your kitchen! This durable and built-to-last mixer is designed to take on all your culinary challenges. With 59 touchpoints around the mixer bowl, you'll get exceptional mixing results every time.

The 5 Quart Stainless Steel Bowl with a comfortable handle is perfect for both small and large batches. In fact, you can mix up to 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaves of bread in a single batch! And don't worry about clean-up, because the bowl is dishwasher safe.

The tilt-head design allows for easy access to the bowl, making it simple to add ingredients while the mixer is running. Lock the head in place for a secure mixing experience.

With 10 speeds, you can tackle any recipe or task with ease. From stirring ingredients together to whipping cream, you'll achieve thorough ingredient incorporation every time.

But the KitchenAid 5 Quart Tilt-Head Stand Mixer is not just about mixing. It's also a culinary center with over 15 optional attachments available. From food grinders to pasta makers, you can get creative and make everything from fresh pasta to veggie noodles and more.

And let's not forget about style! With over 20 colors to choose from, you can find the perfect match for your kitchen design or personality. Express yourself and make a statement with your new KitchenAid mixer.

Included in the package are a coated flat beater, coated dough hook, 6-wire whip, and a pouring shield. The flat beater and dough hook are dishwasher-safe for easy clean-up.

Join the millions of satisfied customers who have made KitchenAid the #1 Mixer Brand in the world. Don't miss out on the opportunity to elevate your cooking and baking experience with the KitchenAid 5 Quart Tilt-Head Stand Mixer. Get yours today and start creating delicious masterpieces in your own kitchen!

Introducing the KitchenAid 5! This incredible stand mixer is perfect for all your baking needs. With its durable and built-to-last metal construction, it can take on any challenge you throw at it. With 59 touchpoints around the mixer bowl, you can trust that your ingredients will be thoroughly mixed every time.

The 5 Quart Stainless Steel Bowl has a comfortable handle and is dishwasher safe, making it easy to handle and clean. It has a large capacity, allowing you to mix up to 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaves of bread in a single batch. No more worrying about making multiple batches!

The tilt-head design of the KitchenAid 5 provides easy access to the bowl, making it simple to add ingredients while mixing. And with 10 speeds, you can easily adjust the mixer to suit any recipe or task. Whether you're stirring wet and dry ingredients together or whipping cream, this mixer can handle it all.

But the KitchenAid 5 is not just a stand mixer - it's a culinary center. With over 20 color options available, you can choose the one that best matches your style and personality. Plus, the power hub allows you to transform your mixer with over 15 optional attachments. From food grinders to pasta makers and more, the possibilities are endless.

Included with the KitchenAid 5 are a coated flat beater, coated dough hook, 6-wire whip, and a pouring shield. The flat beater and dough hook are dishwasher-safe, making cleanup a breeze.

Don't settle for anything less than the best. Join the millions of satisfied customers and make the KitchenAid 5 your go-to stand mixer. Experience the power, versatility, and quality that make KitchenAid the number one mixer brand in the world. Get yours today and take your baking to the next level!

Join the millions of satisfied customers who have made KitchenAid the #1 Mixer Brand in the World*. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your cooking and baking game. Get your KitchenAid 5 Quart Tilt-Head Stand Mixer today and experience the difference for yourself.

KitechAid5
Experience the ultimate power and versatility with the KitchenAid® Artisan® Series 5 Quart Tilt-Head Stand Mixer. Whether you're baking up 9 dozen* of your famous chocolate chip cookies or preparing shredded chicken for Taco Tuesday with friends and family, this stand mixer has the capacity to handle it all. With its durable and built-to-last metal construction, this mixer is truly built to take on any challenge with ease.

The 5 Quart Stainless Steel Bowl with a comfortable handle allows you to mix up to 9 dozen cookies* in a single batch, making it perfect for both small and large batches. Plus, it's dishwasher safe for easy cleanup. The tilt-head design provides easy access to the bowl, allowing you to effortlessly add ingredients while mixing. Simply lock the head in place and let the mixer do the work.

With 10 speeds to choose from, you can easily tackle any task or recipe. From gently kneading dough to whipping cream, this stand mixer ensures thorough ingredient incorporation every time. And with over 20 colors to choose from, you can find the perfect match to complement your kitchen design or showcase your personality.

But the KitchenAid® Artisan® Series 5 Quart Tilt-Head Stand Mixer doesn't stop there. It's also compatible with over 10 optional hub-powered attachments**, allowing you to explore your culinary creativity even further. From food grinders to pasta makers and more, the possibilities are endless. (*Using the flat beater; 28g dough each **sold separately)

As the #1 Mixer Brand in the World*, KitchenAid® stands for quality and performance. With 59 touchpoints around the mixer bowl, this stand mixer delivers exceptional mixing results every time. The power hub turns your stand mixer into a culinary center, opening up a world of possibilities for you to explore.

Experience the unmatched power and versatility of the KitchenAid® Artisan® Series 5 Quart Tilt-Head Stand Mixer. Order yours today and elevate your culinary creations to new heights. Model KSM150PS includes (1) 5 Quart Stainless Steel Bowl, (1) Coated Flat Beater, (1) Coated Dough Hook, (1) 6-Wire Whip, (1) Pouring Shield.

The 5 Quart Stainless Steel Bowl with a comfortable handle is perfect for both small and large batches. You can mix up to 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaves of bread in a single batch. Plus, the bowl is dishwasher safe, making clean-up a breeze. 

The tilt-head design allows for easy access to the bowl, making it simple to add ingredients while the mixer is running. You can lock the head in place while mixing to ensure stability and consistent results. 

With 10 speeds to choose from, you can tackle any task or recipe. From stirring ingredients together to whipping cream, this mixer will give you thorough ingredient incorporation every time. 

Not only does the KitchedAid 5 perform beautifully, but it also comes in over 20 colors to perfectly match your kitchen design or personality. You can choose from a full palette of color options to find the one that best matches your style and personality. 

But the KitchedAid 5 doesn't stop there. It also features a power hub that turns your stand mixer into a culinary center. With over 15 optional attachments available, you can make everything from fresh pasta to burgers, veggie noodles, ice cream, and so much more. 

The KitchedAid 5 includes a coated flat beater, coated dough hook, 6-wire whip, and a pouring shield. The flat beater and dough hook are dishwasher-safe, making clean-up even easier.

Introducing the KitchedAid 5 Quart Tilt-Head Stand Mixer, the perfect addition to your kitchen! This durable and built-to-last mixer is designed to take on any task you throw at it. With its 59 touchpoints around the mixer bowl, you can expect great mixing results every time.

The 5 Quart Stainless Steel Bowl with a comfortable handle is perfect for both small and large batches. You can even mix up to 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaves of bread in a single batch! And don't worry about clean-up, because the bowl is dishwasher safe.

With the tilt-head design, adding ingredients has never been easier. You'll have better access to the bowl, and you can lock the head in place while mixing for added convenience.

This mixer offers 10 speeds, making it suitable for nearly any task or recipe. From mixing ingredients together on the stir speed to whipping cream at speed 8, you can rely on thorough ingredient incorporation every time.

But the KitchedAid 5 Quart Tilt-Head Stand Mixer is not just functional, it's also stylish. With over 20 color options available, you can choose the one that best matches your kitchen design or personality.

Title: KitchedAid 5 (more then 20 color variants, capacity 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaves of bread in single batch, 59 touch points planetary mixing, includes: Quart Stainless Steel Bowl, Coated Flat Beater, Coated Dough Hook, 6-Wire Whip, Pouring Shield)

Description: KitechAid5
* Built to take it all on with the durable and built-to-last metal construction, and 59 touchpoints around the mixer bowl for great mixing results. 
* 5 Quart Stainless Steel Bowl with comfortable handle for small or large batches, to mix up 9 dozen cookies* in a single batch. Dishwasher safe. *Using the flat beater; 28g dough each. 
* Easily add ingredients with the tilt-head design, because you'll have better access to the bowl - lock the head in place while mixing. 
* 10 speeds for nearly any task or recipe, from mixing ingredients together on the stir speed, to whipping cream at speed 8, you'll get thorough ingredient incorporation every time. 
* Match your style with over 20 colors available. Choose from a full palette of color options to best match your style and personality.
* Choose from all the color options to find the one that best matches your style and personality.
* The power hub turns your stand mixer into a culinary center with more than 15 optional attachments available.
* 5-Qt. stainless steel bowl with comfortable handle offers enough capacity to mix dough for 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaves of bread in a single batch.
* 59-Point Planetary Mixing Action means 59 touchpoints per rotation around the bowl for thorough ingredient incorporation.
* The tilt-head design allows clear access to the bowl and attached beater or accessory so you can easily add ingredients for a recipe.
* Powerful enough for nearly any task or recipe, whether you’re stirring wet and dry ingredients together, kneading bread dough or whipping cream.
* Includes coated flat beater, coated dough hook, 6-wire whip and 1-piece pouring shield. The flat beater and dough hook are dishwasher-safe.
